document_data.name: Malivur
document_data.mainbody: '''Malivur''' was a mage of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Malivur had a black, slick moustache.
document_data.Personality: Malivur was impatient and had a terrible temper, but was awed easily by magical power.
document_data.Abilities: Malivur was a mage of some power.
document_data.Activities: During his attempt to capture Shandril, Malivur disguised himself as a spice seller.
document_data.Relationships: Malivur and [[Krostal]] were working together to capture [[Shandril Shessair]] in late {{yearlink|1357}}, though they didn't get along too well.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|243-244|15}} Both of them were known to the Zhentarim scriers [[Hlael Toraunt]] and [[Korthauvar Hammantle]].
document_data.History: Malivur and Krostal were assigned to attempting the capture of Shandril Shessair while she was in a caravan from [[Scornubel]] to [[Waterdeep]] in late 1357 DR.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|272|16}} as well as [[Red Wizards]] scrying under the command of [[Hulrivior]] in [[Triel]].{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|309|18}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Krostal told Malivur he recognized another, especially powerful, fellow mage of the Cult of the Dragon in the caravan. The people scrying on them weren't able to identify that mage; it is possible he was lying.
